name: AFK Applications Inc.
tagline: Life happens when you are AFK
description:
AFK Applications was founded by a group of programmers, passionate about mobile development. We have a portfolio of Android and iOS (iPhone, iPad) applications, as well as develop Android, iOS, Blackberry, and Windows 8 applications for clients. We specialize in Android phones and android tablets, the iPhone, iPad, and the Windows 8 smart phone operating systems. We can develop cross platform natively or in a cross platform language like HTML5 and port your app to any platform you choose.
We have experience creating Android applications that conquer platform fragmentation, with beautiful interfaces that work on phones and tablets. The same goes for iPad and iPhone, we can develop for one or both, and your application is garanteed to work flawlessly on either.
